column1: '''Elvenhome''' almost always refers to [[Eldamar]] (which is "Elvenhome" in the Elves' own tongue)
column2: the homeland of the Elves in [[Aman]]

column1: The word also was a general term for a land inhabited by [[Elves]]. For example
column2: an "Elvenhome" in the song about [[Beren]] and [[Luthien]] refers to [[Doriath]]
column3: <ref>{{FR|Knife}}</ref> and an Elvenhome is mentioned in the [[Hobbit]]-poem ''[[The Hoard]]''
